text: A civilian is a person who is not a military member, a law enforcement officer, or a firefighter. Civilian may also refer to: * A specialist in Roman or modern civil law. ** a member of the College of Civilians. * Civilian (Boy Kill Boy album) * Civilian (Gentle Giant album) * Civilian (Frank Tovey album) * Civilian (Wye Oak album) * Civilian (street artist) * Civilians (Joe Henry album) * Civilian (Adam Pascal album) * The Civilians, a New York-based "investigative" theatre company * Nissan Civilian, a light bus * CIVILIAN (band), a Japanese rock band
title: Civilian (disambiguation)
